MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the PA3 postcode area of Paisley. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified a potential cable fault near Glasgow Airport and we now expect your supply to be restored by 11am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:42am on 14th February 2021
